website_summaries.verdict: Built to last while enabling cooking versatility in the kitchen.
pros: One of the few reversible electric griddles
Offers 200 square inches of cooking space
Durathon ceramic nonstick coating is highly durable
High marks for evenness of cooking time and time again
cons: The griddle may wiggle a bit in its base

customer_reviews.title: This griddle is great!
customer_reviews.text: This griddle is great! I was replacing an old teflon one, and this is a thousand times better. I've had it for 4 months, and used it about once a week or so. I love the ceramic coating. I've made pancakes, bacon, grilled cheese sandwiches, and quesadillas, and it worked well for all. It's so easy to clean too, because nothing sticks. The plugging in on either side is useful, and the grease tray is much larger than my old one, which is nice. I made 2 pounds of bacon and it still had a little room. It doesn't brown perfectly evenly, but nothing does, and this is closer to being even that any other griddle I've owned. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SarahJ

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding non-stick, but [frame/cradle] broke after first use...Boo
customer_reviews.text: Non-stick surface is outstanding so far. Perfectly even pancakes...no noticeable hot/cold spots. Cooks eight 3-4" pancakes at a time. I would've given it 5 stars...but... Major problem: Frame/cradle the griddle sits in cracked after the first use! It's really flimsy (the frame) and cracked right where the grease tray is. Already discarded box/packaging so don't know if Amazon will take it back or exchange it. If I have to go through warranty service with Hamilton Beach I'll let you know how it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: It heats well and maintains a good temperature for a large batch of Papa's homemade buttermilk ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Daughter as a Xmas gift. I got to use when babysitting the Grandkids last month. It heats well and maintains a good temperature for a large batch of Papa's homemade buttermilk pancakes. I like the feature of reversing the plug. Cleanup was great too all parts except the power cord ( Duh ! ) is water immersible to soften up all those dripping from those mis-flipped fluffy vanilla flavored pancakes! I think I need to buy one for myself so I can make some delicious pancakes for the Grandkids when they spend the night at Papa's house!
customer_reviews.author: 51tinkerer

customer_reviews.title: I am glad that I did because it was perfect
customer_reviews.text: I waited to leave a review until I used the appliance more. When I received the box I noticed that it had been opened before. I took the griddle out and upon inspection, saw that this had been previously used and returned as there was food still stuck to the sides of the griddle and the stand. I was tempted to return it but needed one for our upcoming camping trip, so I thoroughly washed, and re-washed the griddle. I am glad that I did because it was perfect. We have made pancakes, bacon, sausage, eggs, etc... on it and am very pleased with the griddle. It works great and clean up is easy.
customer_reviews.author: Vicktorya Kopf

customer_reviews.title: Makes the best pancakes and I no longer burn myself on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Makes the best pancakes and I no longer burn myself on the raised edges of my previous griddle. It is so easy to clean, since the heating plate lifts out of the black support and the cord detaches. I have tried a couple other electric frying pans and griddles, and this is by far the best!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Update - having used this for about a year, the non-stick surface is no longer non-stick, and requires some oil. While it doesn't require much oil, I was hoping for oil-free cooking. I only used this griddle for pancakes once a week, and used a spatula safe for non-stick surfaces. This was a fabulous griddle at the beginning, and I'm disappointed that the surface didn't hold up for a longer period of time.
customer_reviews.author: seabreezecats

customer_reviews.title: Horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Uneven cooking and very hard to regulate temp. Food will stick like glue if you don not use lots of oil/grease. Eggs will burn badly if no oil used and stick so much they have to be scraped off. This is by far one of the worst purchases I have made on Amazon!!! Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: C2CPILOT

customer_reviews.title: do not buy this griddle
customer_reviews.text: If you can't get it out of the package without breaking it then it shouldn't be sold on Amazon. The frame was thin, Cheap, Brittle, and broke just trying to take it out of the wrapping. if you buy this be ready to just throw it away. this is the second one of these items I purchased. The first on worked well and the cook surface is great on both. the photo showed a blue surface and this was a funky goldis brown. The only reason I purchased this because I was quite happy with the Blue Cook Surface version. Don't buy this unless you want to waste you time and $$
customer_reviews.author: jeff

customer_reviews.title: Pancakes cook evenly and cleanup is so easy.
customer_reviews.text: This is everything I hoped for in a grill. Pancakes cook evenly and cleanup is so easy.
customer_reviews.author: kaleema Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this griddle. I took it camping...easy to clean because the cooking surface comes off from the legs. Very nonstick...eggs and pancakes did not stick!!! Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Get it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! I use it several times a week to make protein pancakes to keep in the fridge for my family. We also use it for eggs quite often. Cleans so easily with just warm water. One of my favorite kitchen appliances.
customer_reviews.author: FlowerMom

customer_reviews.title: Ceramic griddle
customer_reviews.text: I have read the reviews on this product. And a couple of the I read was a wrong stated review. This product is great. Not one thing sticks to it. I have used it a few times now i just love it. As long as you fallow the rules you have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Marchelle Twite

customer_reviews.title: Greatly disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: Dont waste your money. This broke the day I got it. The plastic is thin and junk. The only reason gave 3 stars is because it does heat well, cook thoroughly and mostly non stick. Disappointed though!
customer_reviews.author: Family of 9

customer_reviews.title: Works for now, but is already getting that stuff ...
customer_reviews.text: Works for now, but is already getting that stuff that stains which then turns it to a very sticky surface. Have had for about 3 weeks and have used 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sueoka

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: Much nicer surface than traditional black nonsticks. This white panel comes off and we put it in the dishwasher. Eggs, pancakes or bacon all wash off fine without sticking. Not sure how long the surface will last, but the others don't last long either. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Romano

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic griddle
customer_reviews.text: We love this griddle! We've made pancakes on it several times now, and they come out perfect every time. Easy to use, easy to clean, and I love that it's ceramic. Can't recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: Even cooking and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I love how it cooks so evenly. Easy to clean also. I do wish the holding piece was a bit higher than the cooking surface and the tray for holding grease was a bit wider but the pros definitely outlay the cons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best product for the money. We use ours 5-6 times per week. Love it! Cleans up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: One of the best cooking surface finishes I've ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Gunsmoke

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a teflon coated of similar style, easy to use, easy clean up. Works as expected. On occasion when it needs to rech temp it will kick on and cause localized increased heating but nothing to crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Very long
customer_reviews.text: Great non-stick. Love the reversible sides. Would like it shorter & fatter. It is very long & did fit on the countertop I wanted to use.
customer_reviews.author: Stocktongirl

customer_reviews.title: Amazing. We love our griddle
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. We love our griddle. So glad we purchased this one after reading literally hundreds of reviews. Worth every cent! Has not let us down yet.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Slick surface!
customer_reviews.text: So slick I lost a pancake off the side! Easy to clean, very even heat. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: BG Travel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: so far this has been a great griddle and easy to use and care for.
customer_reviews.author: Mary T.

customer_reviews.title: cleans easily. Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: Heats evenly, cleans easily. Just the right size. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Spearman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. Doesn't stick and so easy to clean. Great item
customer_reviews.author: B. Harrigan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that you can take off the griddle to hand wash!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Non stick surface is exactly as it states.
customer_reviews.author: TMcB

customer_reviews.title: An adequate griddle.
customer_reviews.text: The heating is great, but the surface area is slightly smaller than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: RUSSELL M.

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 2 abc both are cheap, flimsy , and broke! I wouldn’t buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it. You had to keep fiddling ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. You had to keep fiddling with the connection in the griddle (not wall) for it to stay on.
customer_reviews.author: janice g

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this griddle. It makes cooking soooo easy with it's even cooking and EASY cleanup. I have made burgers, pancakes, bacon, sausage and eggs on it!
customer_reviews.author: Margie Heckard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super smooth nonstick surface, heats evenly and maintains the level heat consistently. I would highly recommend this unit.
customer_reviews.author: T Farmer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I would pay triple if I would find one that had a rheostat instead of a thermostat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor nonstick coating
customer_reviews.text: Very poor non stick surface. Not happy. Have purchased another brand.
customer_reviews.author: william butler

customer_reviews.title: easy cleanup and cooks food perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I look forward to making breakfast when I have time to use this! easy cleanup and cooks food perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Alonzo Alarcon

customer_reviews.title: Like it a lot
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because of the reversability feature, and doesn't disappoint. Have limited counterspace and this feature lets me put the rheostat on either side. Removing the grill makes much easier to clean, the bulky legs and support separate and the grill plate easily wiped and rinsed in the sink and returned. After a month of pancakes and grilled sandwiches, surface is still no-stick. Both sandwiches and pancakes grill uniformly...no burn stripes on the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Quick even heating and very easy to cleanup
customer_reviews.text: Quick even heating and very easy to cleanup. Excellent non-stick. It did come was a small defect on the cooking surface - it has not increased in size. It took quite a long time to get here as well. Overall a very good purchase - I use it weekly for pancakes and it does a great job.
customer_reviews.author: Reno

customer_reviews.title: Love this griddle
customer_reviews.text: Received this griddle on Christmas. I LOVE IT! Set up was easy, clean up was easy and storage was easy. I made Swedish pancakes, scrambled eggs and bacon. Took less time to clean then it did to make breakfast. Later I made fried potatoes which turned out golden brown and crispy but the one drawback was that the surface is so slippery (due to the non stick coating) I needed 2 spatulas to turn the potatoes over. My first attempt had potatoes all over the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Dee Sharp

customer_reviews.title: this seemed like a good griddle
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box, this seemed like a good griddle. Pancakes were easy to make and would not stick. Eggs, however did require some oil or butter to keep them from sticking. No big deal, as pancakes was the primary use. Unfortunately, the griddle has gotten progressively worse. Now after a month (and after the expiration of Amazon's return period), pancakes stick like glue. The griddle can still be used by adding using some butter or Pam cooking spray, but, that pretty much defeats the purpose of buying a quality non-stick surface. Cleaning has been gentle with no harsh chemicals. I definitely would not buy again and will not recommend to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Gorgeousdevil

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but is very large to store when not being used.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Green

customer_reviews.title: After a few weeks  of use it sticks worse than non oiled stainless steel pans!!
customer_reviews.text: Update 1-30-17. They are refunding my money if i return the griddle! The frame that the grill sits down in, it broke the 2nd time I used it. So I wrapped it in metle tape. Really think the company could have made a better product then to break on second use! ! Is there any way to season this griddle? Cause it sticks after 3 weeks of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Thompson

customer_reviews.title: ... on a Christmas wish list so I hope they like it.
customer_reviews.text: It was on a Christmas wish list so I hope they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Gutches Girl

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised at how good this griddle was. The temperature dial isn't too accurate, but it does heat quite evenly and the surface is reasonably non-stick. I was worried the ceramic wouldn't be ver nonstick, but it seems fine. Time will tell how well it holds up. The fact that you can plug the cord in on either side is absolutely terrific. I wish all griddles were this good. Significantly better than the Presto griddle we used to have, that wore out. My only complaint about this griddle is that when stored on its side when not in use, the griddle surface tends to fall out of the base. It would be better if it latched in somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Will

customer_reviews.title: ... bought my griddle a year ago & it worked great for a while
customer_reviews.text: I bought my griddle a year ago & it worked great for a while. Now the “non stick” ceramic surface is no longer working & food sticks...making it hard to flip simple things like pancakes. Not sure they sell a replacement top.
customer_reviews.author: M.E.

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made and Amazon support was not helpful...
customer_reviews.text: product is easy to wash but how it was made not very happy when I got it it had a few scratches and the surface its rough not very smooth I call Amazon support and they stated that at that time could not help me on a exchange I would not recommend this product to nobody... poorly made or at least the one I got is...
customer_reviews.author: Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Makes eggs, bacon and pancakes easily!
customer_reviews.text: It has a very nice ceramic finish that works well. We really like the ability to change sides to plug ac connector too. The wife really likes the ability to remove cook surface and wash in the sink!
customer_reviews.author: BAX

customer_reviews.title: This is a great non stick surface
customer_reviews.text: This is a great non stick surface. It was a little smaller than I'd hoped though. I cook for three teenage boys and a daycare. I cook A LOT of food at once. It heats evenly and nothing sticks so I am able to switch batches out quickly. No need to wipe it down between pancakes or quisdillas, it slips right off.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Good but not quite right
customer_reviews.text: Bought for gift to replace our dying cheaper griddle. Works ok, main problem is that it is long and too shallow compared to other griddles. Therefore, food slips right over the edge when you flip foods and it is very hard to store due to its extra length. We gave it away.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Tsin Chiu

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than dinner for 2 out to eat.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. My mother has one and I used hers before purchasing one for our family. It makes beautiful pancakes and burgers and bacon and is very easy to clean, as the plate comes off the base for washing. As far as storage goes, it doesn't fold or collapse but for the money it is a good buy. We only use silicone utensils for scratch protection and so far no nicks or cuts in the ceramic. It also came from the factory with no scratches in it. Satisfied customers.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Croy

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Griddle makes a weird noise when plugged in, but works well. Grease tray does not always catch all the grease (reason for 4 starts). Like that it comes apart for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: FishySwim815

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to clean (big plus)
customer_reviews.text: Have had this now for about a month. Temperature has been even across the board. Cooks evenly. Super easy to clean (big plus). The only reason I give it a 4 instead of a five is because of the size. It is rather large and was hard to find a place to store it that was convenient.
customer_reviews.author: NocNurse

customer_reviews.title: Good griddle, seems durabke
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace a worn out one. We really like it. The griddle separates from the stand which makes clean up easy. The surface of the griddle is nonstick and appears quite durable.
customer_reviews.author: TLK-KC

customer_reviews.title: Great product. What you see is what you get
customer_reviews.text: Great product. What you see is what you get. An few inches bigger would have been perfect. The ceramic looks great, hope it doesn't peel over time.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Acero

customer_reviews.title: Super non stick surface
customer_reviews.text: Reversible top aides in placement. Separate griddle and base makes clean up easier. Surface is super non stick. Good heat distribution over the entire surface
customer_reviews.author: sure2rain

customer_reviews.title: Cooks SUPER evenly! and I love that the top comes ...
customer_reviews.text: Cooks SUPER evenly! and I love that the top comes off so you can rinse it in the sink. I've used this at least 8 times since Christmas and I love it so so so so so much.
customer_reviews.author: I build robots

customer_reviews.title: Food safe and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: Works just like they said it would, plus it's food-safe. We got terrific pancakes from it.
customer_reviews.author: S. Thorp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is better than the standard one.. Now, I find out that using water is better to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Everything sticks even if I spray. The drain on ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything sticks even if I spray. The drain on the bottom middle and that actually takes up room on the griddle.
customer_reviews.author: dawn czajka

customer_reviews.title: Hamilton Beach griddle
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift to my mother. She seems happy about it and I will update this review as she uses it and says more about it.
customer_reviews.author: Little Book Nerd

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much smaller than expected. Dont know if all that food fits on the grill.
customer_reviews.author: John Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: The family is happy with the convenience of cleaning and the even cooking ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift. This works very well. The family is happy with the convenience of cleaning and the even cooking of pancakes..
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Electric Griddle
customer_reviews.text: This was a life-saver for us when our stove was broken. It has many nice attributes and I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer #3

customer_reviews.title: Did not hold up. Cooked pancakes on it 4 ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not hold up. Cooked pancakes on it 4 times and the surface was turning black. Returned and had to get product replacement from Hamilton Beach. I chose a can opener.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma of 5

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Great to have the extra cooking space, great even cooking!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: So far it has worked great. Only complaint would be that the power cord ...
customer_reviews.text: So far it has worked great. Only complaint would be that the power cord is pretty short so it has to be used close to the outlet.
customer_reviews.author: TexasDad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My pancakes were perfectly and beautifully made using this griddle. Tried using it for burgers, I dont recommend.
customer_reviews.author: A. Young

customer_reviews.title: Great Hot Plate for the house.
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly and just as stated. The surface of the grill is wonderful. Comes off for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Gary M

customer_reviews.title: A must have kitchen addition
customer_reviews.text: Better than I thought it would be. Extremely happy with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the grill. Easy to clean the top as it's removable.
customer_reviews.author: Yooper 16

customer_reviews.title: Someone may get burned by this model:
customer_reviews.text: The hot griddle element has nothing to lock it in place. One small bump and it can be out of the cradle. Dangerous in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: hightmeadow

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: the best griddle we have owned. if cleaned after each use, the surface stays in great shape. perfect for pancakes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it looks great. Nice and light
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet, but except for being a little bigger than I thought, it looks great. Nice and light.
customer_reviews.author: M. Nilson

customer_reviews.title: Broken in the box.. unuseable.
customer_reviews.text: Bought before Christmas and sat in a cabinet. When I opened the (undamaged) box last week to make some pancakes for the grandkids, the paper thin plastic side was broken completely through.
customer_reviews.author: J Myers

product_meta.title: Hamilton Beach 38519 Beach Reversible Durathon Ceramic Griddle, Black
product_meta.description: Hamilton Beach Reversible Durathon Ceramic Griddle Plug it in from either side . now that's Good Thinking. Set up your griddle where you want to cook without having to get out an extension cord. With a unique reversible design, the Hamilton Beach Reversible Durathon Ceramic Griddle lets you connect the power cord from either side of the griddle. Made with Durathon ceramic, this griddle provides you with superior nonstick performance. The heat is adjustable for a greater range of cooking options. And you can make a whole meal with little fuss thanks to the large 200 square inch cooking surface. Key Features: • Unique reversible design lets you use cord on either side • Durathon ceramic nonstick coating: o 4 times more durable than traditional nonstick o Won't crack or peel o PTFE & PFOA free • 200 square inch cooking surface • Simply lift off griddle for easy cord reversal and cleaning • Adjustable temperature control - 200O-400O Cord Access on Both Sides The reversible design lets you adjust the cord access to either side of the griddle, so you can plug it in to the most convenient outlet. Durathon Surface Won't Crack or Peel With a nonstick ceramic surface four times more durable than traditional nonstick, you won't have to worry about scraping your meal off the cooking surface. Plus, Durathon is safe and free of PTFE & PFOA. Drip Tray Catches Mess A removable, dishwasher-safe drip tray catches excess grease and other drips, keeping your countertop free of messes. Great for Breakfast, Lunch & Dinner Griddles are commonly used at breakfast because they are perfect for pancakes and fried eggs, but they are flexible enough to be used all day. Try grilled cheese sandwiches for lunch or tender, juicy hamburgers and hotdogs for dinner.
feature_bullets: Unique reversible design lets you use cord on either side
Durathon ceramic nonstick coating - 4X more durable than traditional nonstick - won't crack or peel
Simply lift off griddle for easy cord reversal and cleaning
Durathon ceramic nonstick cooking surface is 4 times more durable than traditional nonstick: - won't crack or peel - PTFE & PFOA free
